snippet: Michael F. Vecchione had been a friend and right-hand man to District Attorney Charles J. Hynes, who was defeated for re-election.
abstract: Michael F Vecchione, longtime friend and top deputy of Brooklyn District Attorney Charles J Hynes, plans to retire from office, becoming the first in what is likely to be wave of high-ranking deputies leaving as Hynes prepares to step down; Kenneth J Thompson, who defeated Hynes by wide margins in both Democratic primary and general election, has repeatedly called on him to fire Vecchione.
lead_paragraph: Michael F. Vecchione had been a friend and right-hand man to District Attorney Charles J. Hynes, who was defeated for re-election.

headline.main: Under Fire, Brooklyn Deputy Prosecutor Will Retire
headline.print_headline: Under Fire, Brooklyn Deputy Prosecutor Will Retire
